Uses of Interface
it.apice.sapere.node.agents.SAPEREAgent

Packages that use SAPEREAgent
it.apice.sapere.management This package contains all the entities dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.management.impl This package contains all the implementations dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.node This package contains some node's services. 
it.apice.sapere.node.agents This package contains the SAPEREagents taxonomy. 
it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl This package contains the SAPEREagents implementations. 
it.apice.sapere.node.internal This package contains the Bundle Activator and other utilities. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.bluetooth.impl This package contains entities dedicated to Bluetooth management. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.guestsmngt.impl This package contains entities dedicated to Guests handling. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.obsnotif.impl This package contains the subsystem dedicated to the notification (and management) of remote observation of LSA-space events.

Classes in it.apice.sapere.node.agents that implement SAPEREAgent
 class AbstractSystemAgent
           This class provides a basic realization of a SAPERE System Agent, which is an agent concerned with system administration task.
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.node.agents that return SAPEREAgent
 SAPEREAgent SAPEREAgentsFactory.createAgent(String agentLocalId, SAPEREAgentSpec spec)
           Creates a new SAPEREAgent and binds it to this SAPERE-node or retrieves the homonyomus one.
 SAPEREAgent SAPEREAgentsFactory.createSysAgent(String agentLocalId, SAPERESysAgentSpec spec)
           Creates an agent like SAPEREAgentsFactory.createAgent(String, SAPEREAgentSpec), but with FULL ACCESS TO NODE SERVICES.
 SAPEREAgent SAPEREAgentsFactory.getAgent(String agentLocalId)
           Retrieves a previously created agent on this SAPERE-node.

abstract  void AbstractAccessPolicy.checkInjectPermissions(CompiledLSA cLsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the INJECT operation.
abstract  void AbstractAccessPolicy.checkObservePermissions(LSAid lsaId, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the OBSERVE operation.
abstract  void AbstractAccessPolicy.checkReadPermissions(LSAid lsaId, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the READ operation.
abstract  void AbstractAccessPolicy.checkRemovePermissions(CompiledLSA cLsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the REMOVE operation.
abstract  void AbstractAccessPolicy.checkUpdatePermissions(CompiledLSA cLsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the UPDATE operation.
 void LSAspaceAccessPolicy.setRequestor(SAPEREAgent aReq)
           Sets the agent which will forward requests to the LSA-space that should be checked by this policy.
